languages.text: Радикалы готовы приближаться к границам дозволенного в поисках инструментов и методов, позволяющих достичь их целей. Они зачастую используют вооружение ксеносов или даже творения Хаоса в своих целях. Многих радикалов настигает кара за их еретические деяния, либо же они сами становятся жертвами своих сомнительных методов.

Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.
languages.original_text: Радикалы готовы приближаться к границам дозволенного в поисках инструментов и методов, позволяющих достичь их целей. Они зачастую используют вооружение ксеносов или даже творения Хаоса в своих целях. Многих радикалов настигает кара за их еретические деяния, либо же они сами становятся жертвами своих сомнительных методов.

traits.locale_text: Radicals are willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts, or fall victim to their own dubious methods.

They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

Radicals are willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts, or fall victim to their own dubious methods.

Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

languages.text: Radikale sind stets dazu bereit, Verbote etwas großzügiger auszulegen, wenn es der Beschaffung von Werkzeugen und dem Erreichen ihrer Ziele dient. Für ihre eigenen Zwecke setzen sie häufig Xenos-Waffen und sogar Schöpfungen des Chaos ein. Viele Radikale werden für ihre ketzerischen Taten bestraft oder fallen ihren eigenen zweifelhaften Methoden zum Opfer.
languages.original_text: Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

Für ihre eigenen Zwecke setzen sie häufig Xenos-Waffen und sogar Schöpfungen des Chaos ein. Viele Radikale werden für ihre ketzerischen Taten bestraft oder fallen ihren eigenen zweifelhaften Methoden zum Opfer.

Radikale sind stets dazu bereit, Verbote etwas großzügiger auszulegen, wenn es der Beschaffung von Werkzeugen und dem Erreichen ihrer Ziele dient. Für ihre eigenen Zwecke setzen sie häufig Xenos-Waffen und sogar Schöpfungen des Chaos ein. Viele Radikale werden für ihre ketzerischen Taten bestraft oder fallen ihren eigenen zweifelhaften Methoden zum Opfer.

languages.text: Les radicaux sont toujours disposés à repousser les limites de ce qui est autorisé dans le but d'obtenir des outils et des moyens d'atteindre leurs objectifs. Ils ont fréquemment recours à des armes xénos, voire à des créations du Chaos, s'ils estiment que cela sert leurs intérêts. De nombreux radicaux sont châtiés pour leurs actes hérétiques ou succombent même aux conséquences de leurs propres pratiques douteuses.
languages.original_text: Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

traits.locale_text: Les radicaux sont toujours disposés à repousser les limites de ce qui est autorisé dans le but d'obtenir des outils et des moyens d'atteindre leurs objectifs. Ils ont fréquemment recours à des armes xénos voire à des créations du Chaos, s'ils estiment que cela sert leurs intérêts. De nombreux radicaux sont châtiés pour leurs actes hérétiques ou succombent même aux conséquences de leurs propres pratiques douteuses.

languages.text: 激进派往往会越过帝国律法允许的界限，寻找合适的工具与手段实现目的。他们经常使用异形武器，甚至可能会通过混沌的造物来实现目的。许多激进派成员都由于异端行径遭到了惩罚，或是沦为可疑手段的牺牲品。
languages.original_text: Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

traits.locale_text: 激进派往往会越过帝国律法允许的界限，寻找合适的工具与手段实现目的。他们经常使用异形武器，甚至可能会通过混沌的造物来实现目的。许多激进派成员都由于异端行径遭到了惩罚，或是沦为可疑手段的牺牲品。

languages.text: Se llama radicales a aquellos siempre dispuestos a forzar los límites de lo permisible en busca de herramientas y medios para alcanzar sus objetivos. A menudo usan armamento xenos e incluso las creaciones del Caos para lograr sus metas. Muchos radicales reciben el castigo a su herejía o caen víctimas de sus propios métodos.
languages.original_text: Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

traits.locale_text: Se llama radicales a aquellos siempre dispuestos a forzar los límites de lo permisible en busca de herramientas y medios para alcanzar sus objetivos. A menudo usan armamento xenos e incluso las creaciones del Caos para lograr sus metas. Muchos radicales reciben el castigo a su herejía o caen víctimas de sus propios métodos.

languages.text: 過激派は、目標を達成できる道具や手段を求めて、許される範囲の限度を越えようと突き進む。異種族の兵器や渾沌の創造物さえも、自分たちの目的のために使う事が多い。多くの過激派が異端に染まった行動で処罰されたり、自らの得体の知れない危ないやり方の犠牲になっている。
languages.original_text: Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.

traits.locale_text: 過激派は、目標を達成できる道具や手段を求めて、許される範囲の限度を越えようと突き進む。異種族の兵器や渾沌の創造物さえも、自分たちの目的のために使う事が多い。多くの過激派が異端に染まった行動で処罰されたり、自らの得体の知れない危ないやり方の犠牲になっている。

languages.text: Radikaller, hedeflerine ulaşmak için gereken araç ve çareleri ararken müsaade edilebilir olanın sınırlarını zorlamaya heveslidirler. Genellikle zeno silahlarını, hatta Kaos icatlarını, kendi amaçları için kullanılırlar. Pek çok radikal, kâfirce eylemleri için cezalandırılmakta veya kendi şaibeli yöntemlerinin kurbanı olmaktadır.
languages.original_text: Radicals are always willing to push the boundaries of what is permissible in the quest for the tools and means to achieve their goals. They often use xenos weaponry and even creations of Chaos for their own ends. Many radicals are punished for their heretical acts or even fall victim to their own dubious methods.
